amendment.description: To provide for equitable reimbursement rates in 2004 and 205 for Medicare+Choice organizations making the transition to MedicareAdvantage organization.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1040 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1040 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S8500-8502, S8506-8512; text: CR S8500-8501) To provide for equitable reimbursement rates in 2004 and 205 for Medicare+Choice organizations making the transition to MedicareAdvantage organization.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1040 proposed by Senator Schumer.
